sentences.en: "It's been a lovely day," she said, dismissing the episode.
sentences.cn: “这是开心的一天，”她说，将那事抛到了脑后。

sentences.en: A pilot episode of Nothing's Impossible has already been filmed.
sentences.cn: 《一切皆有可能》的试播集已拍摄出来了。

sentences.en: I have just arrived home from Mexico, and learned about that episode.
sentences.cn: 我刚从墨西哥回到家中, 就听到了那条新闻.

sentences.en: I'd like to try and forget the whole episode.
sentences.cn: 我倒想尽量把那段经历全部忘掉。

sentences.en: It makes you want to watch the next episode to find out what's going to happen.
sentences.cn: 这让人想要看下一集，弄清紧接着会发生什么事。

sentences.en: It's that inflammed right ear, you know. It's a febrile episode.
sentences.cn: 就是这个发炎的右耳朵引起的, 你知道, 这是并发症.

sentences.en: Mr Butterfield denies having anything to do with the episode.
sentences.cn: 巴特菲尔德先生否认和此事有关。

sentences.en: Oh, the whole episode was entirely his fault.
sentences.cn: 天啊，整件事完全是他的错。

sentences.en: One of the funniest episodes in the book occurs in Chapter 6.
sentences.cn: 书中最有趣的片段之一在第6章。

sentences.en: one of the most interesting episodes in his career
sentences.cn: 他职业生涯中最有趣的时期之一

sentences.en: She decided she would try to forget the episode by the lake.
sentences.cn: 她决心尽量忘掉湖边的那次经历。

sentences.en: The episode was a huge embarrassment for all concerned.
sentences.cn: 这段小插曲令所有有关人员都感到非常尴尬.

sentences.en: The final episode will be shown next Sunday.
sentences.cn: 下周日将播出最后一集。

sentences.en: The whole episode made me vengeful.
sentences.cn: 整个事件使我一心想复仇.

sentences.en: This episode is bound to be a deep embarrassment for Washington.
sentences.cn: 这一事件肯定会让华盛顿非常难堪。

sentences.en: This episode may serve as a paradigm.
sentences.cn: 这一插曲可以充作典型例子.

sentences.en: This episode remains sharply engraved on my mind.
sentences.cn: 这段经历至今仍深深地铭刻在我的心中.

sentences.en: Unfortunately it was a rather sordid episode of my life.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，这是我人生中非常不光彩的一段经历。
请收看下周精彩的一集！

trans.tran_cn: 一集，一节，插曲，一段经历，（病症）发作期
trans.tran_en: an event or a short period of time during which something happens
